body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, clothing merchant. Native of Hanover. Married to Maria E. Irr Helmke in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on April 9, 1858. Father of Annie Helmke and Eliza Helmke. Merchant in Louisville in 1860. Employed Ann Mayer and Mary Mayer as servants in Louisville in 1860. Clothing merchant in partnership with Julius Von Bories and Herman Beckurts in J. Von Bories & Company in Louisville in 1861. Merchant in Louisville in 1863. Clothing merchant in partnership with Julius Von Bories and Herman Beckurts in J. Von Bories & Company in Louisville in 1865.
